title: Conceptual Database Modeling Design and Formative Assessment-Based Learning Monitoring

context.prior_knowledge: Basic database structures and SQL application experience
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented curriculum for current professionals, integrating online/offline learning environments using digital devices for workplace application.

learning_goals: Learners can design an Entity-Relationship Diagram (ERD) with over 85% accuracy
Learners can correct modeling errors by over 50% based on formative assessment feedback
Learners can achieve the passing criteria three times consecutively in project-based assessments reflecting real-world work scenarios
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
